title: Maddingley
creator_credit: Cambridge Films, Atlas Associates and APM Productions
brief_description: A documentary film showing the brown coal mining process at Maddingley in Bacchus Marsh, Victoria, and then goes on to show how the coal is used for the production of paper at the Australian Paper Mills plant. Also includes scenes of the workers and their families of Bacchus Marsh at play.
